title: Armitron Continues 50th Anniversary Giving by Uplifting the New Generation of Leaders with Girls Inc.
description: In celebration of its 50th anniversary in 2025, Armitron (https://www.armitron/), the beloved American watch brand known for timeless style and purpose-driven values, is proud to announce the donation of 50 watches to Girls Inc., a nonprofit dedicated to inspiring all girls to be strong, smart, and bold.
content:
Armitron Donates 50 Watches to Girls Inc. Staff Who Inspire Confidence, Courage, and Success Among Young Women

NEW YORK, Aug. 6, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- In celebration of its 50th anniversary in 2025, Armitron (https://www.armitron.com/), the beloved American watch brand known for timeless style and purpose-driven values, is proud to announce the donation of 50 watches to Girls Inc., a nonprofit dedicated to inspiring all girls to be strong, smart, and bold.

As part of Armitron's year-long initiative to support organizations aligned with its core pillars—kindness, wellness, sustainability, and women's empowerment—this donation highlights Girls Inc.'s vital role in building brighter futures by supporting girls in developing the skills they need to thrive.

"Girls Inc. is shaping the next generation of fearless female leaders, and we're honored to support their mission," said Bobbie Weichselbaum, CEO of E. Gluck Corporation. "These watches are more than just accessories—they're a symbol of empowerment, a boost of confidence, and a reminder that every girl's time is now."

Serving girls across the U.S. and Canada, Girls Inc. equips participants with life skills, leadership tools, and a supportive network to help them thrive academically, socially, and emotionally.

"This meaningful gift from Armitron reminds staff that the time they spend supporting girls in reaching their fullest potential is invaluable," said Tiffany Trotter, Chief People & Culture Officer. "We're grateful for partners who champion our mission and celebrate our staff and the success of girls."

The donation is part of Armitron's 50th-anniversary "Gives Back" campaign, through which the brand is donating 50 watches each month in 2025 to organizations making a difference in communities nationwide.
summary: Armitron has donated 50 watches to Girls Inc. in celebration of its 50th anniversary in 2025. The donation is part of Armitron's year-long initiative to support non-profit organizations aligned with its core pillars of kindness, wellness, sustainability, and women's empowerment. This donation highlights Girls Inc.'s vital role in supporting girls in developing the skills they need to thrive. The watches are more than just accessories, they're a symbol of empowerment and a reminder that every girl's time is now.
shortSummary: Armitron donated 50 Watches to Girls Inc, celebrating its 50th anniversary, to support its mission of inspiring strong and empowered women.

NEW YORK, Aug. 6, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- In celebration of its 50th anniversary in 2025, Armitron (https://www.armitron.com/), the beloved American watch brand known for timeless style and purpose-driven values, is proud to announce the donation of 50 watches to Girls Inc., a nonprofit dedicated to inspiring all girls to be strong, smart, and bold.
As part of Armitron's year-long initiative to support organizations aligned with its core pillars—kindness, wellness, sustainability, and women's empowerment—this donation highlights Girls Inc.'s vital role in building brighter futures by supporting girls in developing the skills they need to thrive.
"Girls Inc. is shaping the next generation of fearless female leaders, and we're honored to support their mission," said Bobbie Weichselbaum, CEO of E. Gluck Corporation. "These watches are more than just accessories—they're a symbol of empowerment, a boost of confidence, and a reminder that every girl's time is now."
Serving girls across the U.S. and Canada, Girls Inc. equips participants with life skills, leadership tools, and a supportive network to help them thrive academically, socially, and emotionally.
"This meaningful gift from Armitron reminds staff that the time they spend supporting girls in reaching their fullest potential is invaluable," said Tiffany Trotter, Chief People & Culture Officer. "We're grateful for partners who champion our mission and celebrate our staff and the success of girls."
The donation is part of Armitron's 50th-anniversary "Gives Back" campaign, through which the brand is donating 50 watches each month in 2025 to organizations making a difference in communities nationwide.

Our customer favorites.
-
Wave™
40mm, Orange/BlackRegular Price $95Crafted with care from recycled ocean-bound plastic sourced from Tide Ocean Material SA, the Wave collection embodies a commitment to sustainability. Offering a vibrant array of colors, including orange with a black case, green with a black case, and white with a navy case. Engineered for both style and comfort, these timepieces feature natural materials for a sustainable experience. Designed to retain their shape over time, Wave watches prioritize ultimate comfort while being mindful of the environment. Join the movement towards sustainable fashion with Wave, where eco-consciousness meets impeccable design. Armitron is a proud supporter of the Wildlife Conservation Society (WCS) and is donating $30,000 to help advance its mission to save wildlife and wild places worldwide. -
Minnie™
24mm, SilverRegular Price $50Small yet mighty, the petite Minnie is a delicate women's dress watch that packs a punch in the style department. Available in a range of stunning dial colors and finishes, this watch features genuine crystals, accented bezels, and a jewelry-inspired bracelet. -
Reef™
36mm, Gray/IvoryRegular Price $95Rooted in a dedication to our planet's well-being, the Reef watch is a testament to sustainable craftsmanship. Forged from recycled ocean-bound plastic sourced from Tide Ocean Material SA, with an ivory case, the Reef champions the preservation of marine environments. This solar powered watch is complemented by a ivory-tone dial with Arabic indexes, a matching bezel, and a gray natural rubber strap, blending style and comfort with environmental consciousness. Armitron is a proud supporter of the Wildlife Conservation Society (WCS) and is donating $30,000 to help advance its mission to save wildlife and wild places worldwide. -
Jalyn™
36mm, White Ceramic/SilverRegular Price $125This ceramic-clad beauty is a fresh breath of summer air. Jalyn™ features a smooth white ceramic case and bracelet for a look that's as comfortable as it is versatile. The ceramic material is soft, durable and scratch resistant. Available with silver or gold accents. -
Constance™
36mm, Pearl/SilverRegular Price $105Constance is a vision of refined elegance. This elevated statement piece is luxe at every turn with a stunning mother of pearl dial and genuine crystal markers. Finished with a textured bezel and jewelry-inspired stainless steel bracelet, Constance is sure to turn heads. -
Tilly™
20mm, Yellow GoldRegular Price $75Everyone loves a refined classic. Enter: Tilly. This delicate rectangular watch is pure sophistication with its traditional roman numeral markers. This tank-style Tilly comes in a classic gold-tone. -
Rachel™
36mm, Champagne/SilverRegular Price $85The Rachel is part of our gorgeous his-and-hers duo inspired by the iconic sitcom couple. A polished coin edge bezel and adjustable link bracelet accent the elegant, round stainless steel case. It is available in silver and gold tones and two-tone silver/gold and silver/rose gold. This timepiece also features a sophisticated dial with Roman numeral markers and a push-button clasp closure. Shop the designs and check out the matching men's Ross watch for your special someone or as an engagement or wedding gift. -
Tilly™
20mm, Black Leather/CrocoRegular Price $65Introducing the newest Tilly watch – a symbol of timeless sophistication. This exquisite timepiece features a genuine leather croco grain band in red, navy, or black, adding a pop of color to your wrist. The dial boasts a silvery/white sandblast finish with Roman numerals as indices, exuding classic elegance. Encased in a gold-tone frame, the delicate rectangular design makes the Tilly watch a chic accessory for any occasion. -
Prismatica™
33mm, IridescentRegular Price $70Bring in the color! Static is boring, but your watch doesn’t have to be. Prismatica™ features a one-of-a-kind dial that changes color with the minute hand every 10 minutes. Leave your old static watches behind and bring in the color revolution with Prismatica™.
-
Wave™
40mm, Orange/BlackRegular Price $95Crafted with care from recycled ocean-bound plastic sourced from Tide Ocean Material SA, the Wave collection embodies a commitment to sustainability. Offering a vibrant array of colors, including orange with a black case, green with a black case, and white with a navy case. Engineered for both style and comfort, these timepieces feature natural materials for a sustainable experience. Designed to retain their shape over time, Wave watches prioritize ultimate comfort while being mindful of the environment. Join the movement towards sustainable fashion with Wave, where eco-consciousness meets impeccable design. Armitron is a proud supporter of the Wildlife Conservation Society (WCS) and is donating $30,000 to help advance its mission to save wildlife and wild places worldwide. -
Grant™
32mm, SilverRegular Price $85Introducing the Grant watch, a timeless and sophisticated timepiece designed for those with a penchant for elegance. The stainless steel silver-tone band seamlessly complements the tank-style, exuding a refined aesthetic. Its analog movement ensures precision in timekeeping, while the white dial adorned with a combination of Roman numerals and gold sticks creates a striking visual contrast. The metal bezel and matching silver-tone stainless steel case further enhance the watch's durability and style, making the Grant watch a perfect accessory for any occasion. -
Ridgemont™
42mm, BlueRegular Price $80The Ridgemont combines sophistication with modern functionality, featuring a sleek silver stainless steel bracelet and a distinctive watch face. It is equipped with EL technology—where the digital panel illuminates with a soft glow, ensuring easy readability in any lighting conditions. Its ana-digi movement seamlessly integrates analog and digital components, offering precision and versatility. The square case shape adds a contemporary edge to the design, complementing the striking navy dial. With a day and date calendar function and index markers in the form of sticks, the Ridgemont watch is a stylish and practical accessory for those who appreciate a harmonious blend of form and function. -
Rogue™
35mm, IridescentRegular Price $75The Rogue Iridescent watch effortlessly combines contemporary and retro influences, creating a stylish accessory for the modern trendsetter. Featuring a polished black dial, durable mineral crystal, and a vibrant rainbow-colored case and band, the Rogue Iridescent exudes a captivating style. The watch integrates cutting-edge digital movement and chronograph functionality, enhanced by the secure and convenient fold-over buckle closure. -
Metro™
33mm, GoldRegular Price $80This refined timepiece features a gold-tone rectangle case and a sleek black dial. The gold-tone stainless steel band, paired with a secure fold-over buckle closure, adds a touch of sophistication to any ensemble. The Metro watch embodies sturdy construction and urban elegance, featuring a day and date calendar and a backlit LED display. -
Ross™
40mm, Gold/SilverRegular Price $95Just a Ross looking for his Rachel, this signature timepiece is one half of a classic his-and-hers duo. The stainless steel case, bracelet, and coin edge bezel are available in stunning gold-tone, silver-tone, and two-tone, featuring glossy white, sunray silver, or glossy black dial. Explore all three and check out Rachel for the lady in your life or to gift to your favorite couple. -
Blueprint™
42mm, Navy/SilverRegular Price $175Our latest release is a feat of engineering and precision timekeeping. The stainless steel Blueprint is powered by an automatic movement, a self-winding mechanism that operates without a battery by using the wearer's natural arm movements to power the timepiece. Built to last with style and sophistication, Blueprint is available in a range of finishes, including: leather bands, metal bracelets, and a one-of-a-kind iridescent plated edition. -
Charles™
45mm, Tan/IvoryRegular Price $100Sleek and sophisticated, Charles is all about the details. The textured dial adds a dash of classic charm, while the sub-dials and bezel provide multi-function capabilities. Housed in a stainless steel case and finished with a sturdy stainless steel mesh bracelet or genuine leather band, Charles is made for years of treasured use. -
Miles™
42mm, Gold/TanRegular Price $75Miles is a timeless, classic watch that’s beautifully crafted with a premium leather band in three autumnal shades. The traditional dial design brings an air of old-world sophistication and is finished with rich tones of burgundy, tan, and green in sumptuous genuine leather. Complement your dressy look or elevate a casual weekend fit with the unisex Miles. -
Tetra™
36mm, Black/RedRegular Price $70Tetra is funky reimagination of Armitron's original LED digital watch. The vintage-inspired oblong case design is finished with polished silver, gold, and black-plated versions. The flashing digital display waits in sleek black sleep mode until activated by pressing the side button. Strap on this retro minimalist style and wear a piece of fashion history. Available exclusively on Armitron. -
Skeleton™
42mm, Silver/Black/BlueRegular Price $165Elevate your look with this stainless steel timepiece featuring a 21 jewel automatic movement, durable ionic-plating, and a striking exhibition case back. A classic statement piece to be lived in for generations. -
Griffy®
37mm, Silver/RedRegular Price $60Stranger Things fans to the front. The Griffy® updates Armitron’s original genre-defining LED digital watch from the 1970’s with a flashing red display that waits in sleek black sleep mode until activated by pressing the side button. Strap on this retro minimalist style and wear a piece of fashion history.
Love Every Second
An Armitron watch is your daily little reminder to not only celebrate the big moments but to appreciate the little things too. We’re your constant companion and trusted partner. We help you to be on time, stay on time and to make the most of time.

Armitron Boom Smartwatch and Earbuds™
Black
Regular Price
$60
The Armitron Boom Smartwatch and Earbuds, available in black, lavender, and white, deliver a stylish, feature-packed experience designed just for youth. Track steps, sleep, heart rate, and more right from your wrist. Customize the watch face with your favorite photos and enjoy up to 4 days of battery life for the smartwatch. Boom Audio™ earbuds deliver crisp, volume-safe sound with a compact charging case that provides up to 14 hours of playtime. Both the watch and earbuds pair easily with iOS and Android devices. It’s a smart, connected set that offers style, function, and freedom, built for life on the move.

Ava™
18.4mm, Gold/Crystals
Regular Price
$110
The Ava watch embodies refined elegance, offered in your choice of radiant gold-tone or sleek silver-tone. A rectangular case is framed by a polished bezel set with 14 shimmering baguette crystals, creating a statement of luxury. The vertically brushed dial, light champagne or silver, features four delicate round crystal markers for a sophisticated finish. Its adjustable link bracelet, adorned with 42 baguette crystals, adds brilliance from every angle—a timeless piece designed to elevate any ensemble with grace and glamour.

The ribbed stainless steel crown and crystal-studded expansion band—featuring 105 more crystals—enhance its statement-making elegance. Sleek, structured, and unapologetically glamorous, this watch delivers refined sparkle with every glance.

argos_summary: In celebration of its 50th anniversary, Armitron has donated 50 watches to Girls Inc., a nonprofit organization that empowers young women. This initiative is part of Armitron's year-long 'Gives Back' campaign, which focuses on kindness, wellness, sustainability, and women's empowerment. The donation aims to recognize the efforts of Girls Inc. staff in inspiring confidence and leadership among girls across the U.S. and Canada.
